SEARCH
Package model

Class CommonObjective

java.lang.Object
model.Objective
model.CommonObjective
public class CommonObjective extends Objective
Class to handle the common objectives It contains the name and the current value of the objective, plus a set of the people having completed the objective. From a game constructor, you should call `generateCommonObjectives(numberOfPlayers)` to extract the two randomly chosen objectives as an `ArrayList` and check if they have been completed with `isCompleted(shelf, playerName)`.

  • Constructor Details

    • CommonObjective

      public CommonObjective(String name, int nPlayers, Function<Shelf,Boolean> checkCompleted)
      Constructor that creates a new common objective with a specified name, value, and point decrement based on the number of players. The objective also includes a function for checking if it has been completed.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the objective
      nPlayers - The number of players in the game
      checkCompleted - A function for checking if the objective has been completed

    • CommonObjective

      public CommonObjective(SaveCommonObjective objective, int nPlayers)
      Construct a common objective from a saved one.
      Parameters:
      objective - The saved object
      nPlayers - The number of players in the game

    • generateAllCommonObjectives

      public static ArrayList<CommonObjective> generateAllCommonObjectives(int nPlayers)
      Generate the list of all the common objectives
      Parameters:
      nPlayers - The number of players in the game
      Returns:
      An array list containing all the common objectives

    • generateCommonObjectives

      public static ArrayList<CommonObjective> generateCommonObjectives(int nPlayers)
      Method that generates a list of common objectives based on the number of players.
      Parameters:
      nPlayers - The number of players in the game
      Returns:
      An array list of two randomly selected common objectives

    • isCompleted

      public Optional<Cockade> isCompleted(Shelf shelf, String player)
      Method that checks if the common objective has been completed using a specified shelf, and returns an Optional object containing a Cockade trophy if it has. If the objective is completed, the value of the trophy is decreased by the point decrement.
      Parameters:
      shelf - The shelf to check for completion of the objective
      Returns:
      Optional object containing a Cockade trophy, or an empty Optional object if the objective has not been completed

    • getValue

      Getter for the value attribute
      Returns:
      The current value of the objective

      Parameters:
      shelf - The shelf object
      n - The size of the group to check for
      Returns:
      The number of groups of n cards present in the given Shelf object
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is any error while checking
